page.title: 07 Higher Bruckland Farm
page.content:
Two families work at Higher Bruckland farm. Mr Holmes the Farmer gets up at a quarter to six.
His first job is to get the cows for milking at 6 0'Clock. Mr Holmes finishes his work between six o'clock and ten in the evening.
Mr Holmes has Saturdays off and the other family works on the farm. Some of the crops that they grow are wheat, barley and oats. Some of the machines they use are tractors, a mowing machine,a forage wagon, a baler,four trailors, some ploughs, a cultivating machine, and some rollers. They use some of the crops for their own stock but some of it they sell.
